scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.postinstall: if [ -n "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy; else npx prisma generate; fi && npx tsc --outDir dist
scripts.prepare: if [ -n "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy; else npx prisma generate; fi && npx tsc --outDir dist
scripts.build: npm install && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy && npx tsc --outDir dist
scripts.build:backend: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npx tsc --outDir ./dist && echo 'TypeScript compilation completed' && ls -la dist/
scripts.build:render: NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=2048' prisma generate && prisma migrate deploy && npm run build:backend && echo 'Build completed' && ls -la dist/ && echo 'Verifying index.js exists:' && ls -la dist/index.js
scripts.start: node dist/index.js || node ./dist/index.js || (echo 'Build failed, attempting to build now...' && npm run build:backend && node dist/index.js) || (echo 'Current directory:' && pwd && echo 'Directory contents:' && ls -la && echo 'Dist contents:' && ls -la dist/ && exit 1)
